scripts.minify: rm -rf min && mkdir min && uglifyjs src/renderer.js --output min/renderer.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup src/renderer.js --file build/index.iife.js --format iife --name modularParticleSystemWebglRenderer && cp src/renderer.js build/index.js
scripts.release:build: rm -rf release && mkdir release && npm run build && cp -r LICENSE README.md package.json build/** release
scripts.release: npm run release:build && cd release && npm publish
